title: Graphic Designer
job_overview:
About The Job
Oleve is looking for a talented designer skilled in both AI image generation and Figma design to create captivating content for social media. The primary focus is on generating AI images as well as design assets created in Figma for TikTok content, ensuring they are engaging and visually appealing. There is an opportunity  for this role to become full-time

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in AI image generation for social media, specifically TikTok
- Proficiency in Figma for creating cohesive and attractive designs
- Ability to produce images that enhance engagement and capture attention
- Creativity in designing promotional, informational, and engaging posts

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Strong background in AI tools and platforms for image creation
- Experience with Figma for designing social media assets
- A portfolio showcasing previous work in social media content creation
- Understanding of TikTok trends and audience preferences

If you have a flair for creating visually stunning and engaging social media content, please apply! 

Hourly Rate $15/hr
